title: Prey Mooncrash v1 07 Update Crackfix-SKIDROW
description:
S K I D R O W
the leading force

proudly presents
Prey: Mooncrash v1.07 Update Crackfix

16-07-2018......Release Date <-> Protection.................Steam
FPS................Game Type <-> Disk(s)......................DOX

CRACKFIX NOTES

1.Sorry for the issues with the previous crack, we're still taking care
of some corner cases with controllers

2.If you are using plain old ACME controller, activate its Analog Mode

3.In case you still encounter lags while playing without controller
set EnableController=false in [GameSettings] in steam_api.ini

RELEASE NOTES

Read changelog.txt for information on the updated content!

Additional Notes:

Prey.Mooncrash-SKIDROW
Prey.Mooncrash.v1.07.Update-SKIDROW

Are needed to install this release!

This will also work with the language pack - take a peak inside the
LANGUAGE PACK folder and pick the language of your choice

IMPORTANT:
If you use an older ACME type controller(Dinput) , be sure to put it in
"Analog" mode(press "Analog" button between the sticks). Otherwise
right stick's command will overlap with ABXY buttons in digital mode

INSTALL NOTES

1. Unpack the release
2. Copy the cracked content from the SKIDROW folder and into the main
install folder and overwrite
3. For multi language users - Copy the cracked content from the
LANGUAGE PACK folder and into the main install folder and overwrite
4. Block the game in your firewall and mark our cracked content as
secure/trusted in your antivirus program
5. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!
6. Remember to run game with admin rights - especially on drive C:
7. Play the game
8. Support the companies, which software you actually enjoy!

GREETINGS

To all friends of the family and honorable rival groups!

ascii art by the
godlike & terrific duo
malodix + irokos
titan artdivision
